item.title: Ualá 与 TelevisaUnivision 完成 E 轮融资 6600 万美元
item.description: 拉美金融科技公司 Ualá 在第二轮融资中将其 E 轮融资额提高了 6600 万美元，墨西哥媒体巨头 TelevisaUnivision 也参与了此次融资。【原文：Latin American fintech Ualá boosted its Series E round by $66 million in a second close that included participation from Mexican media giant TelevisaUnivision.】

item.title: 人工智能推动需求增长，美光发布乐观销售预测
item.description: 美国最大的计算机内存芯片制造商美光科技公司（Micron Technology Inc.【原文：Micron Technology Inc., the largest US maker of computer memory chips, gave a strong sales forecast for the current quarter, bolstered by demand for artificial intelligence products.】

item.title: 随着国防开支的增长，行星实验室的积压工作增加了一倍多
item.description: 卫星数据提供商 Planet Labs PBC 预计，欧洲国防开支的增加将进一步促进对其服务的需求，此前该公司在第四季度的积压工作增加了一倍多。【原文：Satellite data provider Planet Labs PBC expects increased defense spending in Europe to further boost demand for its services after its backlog more than doubled in the fourth quarter.】

item.title: 法官暂时禁止政府专家组查阅社保记录
item.description: 马里兰州的一名联邦法官暂时阻止了埃隆-马斯克的政府效率团队访问可能数以亿计从美国政府领取退休金和其他福利的美国人的个人信息。【原文：A Maryland federal judge temporarily blocked Elon Musk’s government efficiency team from accessing the personal information of potentially hundreds of millions of Americans who receive retirement payments and other benefits from the US government.】

item.title: 黑格塞斯吹嘘五角大楼在性别平等办公室领导下又削减了 5.8 亿美元
item.description: 国防部长皮特-黑格塞斯（Pete Hegseth）表示，作为他与埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的政府效率部（Department of Government Efficiency）合作的一部分，他将取消超过 5.8 亿美元与唐纳德-特朗普总统的优先事项不一致的项目。【原文：Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth said he’s canceling more than $580 million in programs that don’t align with President Donald Trump’s priorities, as part of his partnership with Elon Musk’s Department of Government Efficiency.】

item.title: 华尔街经纪人开始交易洛杉矶大火的保险公司索赔
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，华尔街经纪人已开始出售保险公司与洛杉矶致命野火有关的索赔，这可能会引发被指责造成破坏的公用事业公司的赔付。【原文：Wall Street brokers have started selling insurers’ claims tied to Los Angeles’ deadly wildfires, which may trigger a payout from the utilities blamed for the destruction, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 英伟达首席执行官称其惊讶于公开控股量子公司的存在
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.首席执行官黄仁勋（Jensen Huang）说，当他早些时候发表导致行业股票暴跌的言论时，他并没有意识到有公开交易的量子计算公司。【原文：Nvidia Corp. Chief Executive Officer Jensen Huang said he didn’t realize there were publicly traded quantum-computing companies when he made earlier comments that caused industry stocks to crash.】

item.title: Insight Partners 将从 Google-Wiz 交易中获利 27 亿美元
item.description: 据一位知情人士透露，Insight Partners 公司即将向谷歌母公司 Alphabet 公司出售网络安全公司 Wiz Inc.【原文：Insight Partners is set to deliver a return of more than 15 times its invested capital from the pending sale of cybersecurity firm Wiz Inc. to Google parent Alphabet Inc., according to a person with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: Spotify 上的色情内容正在渗入该平台的顶级播客排行榜
item.description:
Spotify 不允许播放这些露骨的视频，但这些视频却与该服务中一些最受欢迎的播客同时出现

。【原文：

The sexually explicit videos, which Spotify doesn’t allow, have shown up alongside some of the most popular podcasts on the service

】

item.title: 米涅瓦公司认为全球牛群正在缩小，牛肉价格将上涨
item.description: 据巴西肉类加工企业米涅瓦公司（Minerva SA）称，美国、欧洲和中国的牛群数量正在减少，这表明牛肉价格可能会进一步上涨。【原文：Cattle herds are declining in the US, Europe and China, according to Brazilian meatpacker Minerva SA, in a sign that beef prices could rise further.】

item.title: 雷蒙德-詹姆斯认为新石油项目是十年来最多的一次
item.description: 从巴西到沙特阿拉伯，今年将有大量石油项目投产，这将是十多年来最大的原油新产量注入。【原文：A flurry of oil projects from Brazil to Saudi Arabia are set to come online this year, providing the biggest infusion of new crude production in more than a decade.】

item.title: Lyft 将 "最快于今年夏天 "提供无人驾驶乘车服务
item.description: Lyft 公司表示，该公司计划 "最快在今年夏天 "在其平台上提供无人驾驶车辆，而且随着自动驾驶乘车服务越来越普及，该公司认为人类司机将转而从事车队管理等其他工作。【原文：Lyft Inc. said it plans to offer driverless vehicles on its platform “as soon as this summer,” and that it sees human drivers transitioning to other work such as fleet management as autonomous rides become more ubiquitous.】

item.title: 西班牙在中国问题上的 "务实 "立场或将吸引 30 亿欧元投资
item.description: 据亚洲国家驻马德里大使称，由于西班牙在与中国的关系上采取了 "务实的态度"，中国公司正在商谈在西班牙追加 30 亿欧元（33 亿美元）的投资。【原文：Chinese companies are negotiating an additional €3 billion ($3.3 billion) of investments in Spain as the country adopts a “pragmatic approach” to relations with Beijing, according to the Asian country’s ambassador in Madrid.】

item.title: 价值 180 亿美元的早期融资谈判中的困惑
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，建立人工智能搜索引擎以与谷歌竞争的初创公司 Perplexity AI Inc.【原文：Perplexity AI Inc., a startup building an artificial intelligence search engine to compete with Google, is in early talks to double its valuation to $18 billion in a new funding round, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 轮胎厂 10 亿美元交易考验市政风险阈值
item.description: 下周，一家新轮胎厂将发售 11.5 亿美元的债券，这将考验市政债券市场对高收益债券看似永不满足的胃口。【原文：The muni market’s seemingly insatiable appetite for high-yield bonds will be tested next week by a $1.15 billion debt sale for a new tire factory.】

item.title: 华尔街不确定美联储何时结束资产负债表缩表
item.description: 美联储削减资产负债表放松步伐的决定正促使一些华尔街策略师，包括巴克莱银行和美国银行的策略师，推高他们对央行紧缩政策将持续多久的预期。【原文：The Federal Reserve’s decision to cut the pace of its balance-sheet unwind is leading some Wall Street strategists — including those at Barclays and Bank of America — to push out their expectations for how long the central bank’s runoff will go on.】

item.title: 赞比亚创纪录的高外汇储备无法解决货币问题
item.description: 赞比亚的外汇储备已创下历史新高，但历史性干旱的余波意味着这个非洲第二大铜生产国继续面临货币困境。【原文：Zambia has achieved record-high foreign-exchange reserves, yet the hangover from a historic drought means that Africa’s second-biggest copper producer continues to face currency pain.】

item.title: 英国央行特立独行的利率制定者再次令市场大吃一惊
item.description: 英国央行最难以预测的决策者周四再次令市场和经济学家大跌眼镜。【原文：The Bank of England’s most unpredictable policymaker wrong-footed markets and economists again on Thursday.】

item.title: 马克莱姆称关税通胀将限制对经济的支持
item.description: 加拿大央行行长蒂夫-马克莱姆（Tiff Macklem）表示，贸易战导致通胀上升的风险限制了央行降息以促进经济增长的能力，并警告说根据不确定的前景调整政策是危险的。【原文：Bank of Canada Governor Tiff Macklem said the risk of higher inflation from a trade war limits the central bank’s ability to cut interest rates to boost growth, and warned about the dangers of adjusting policy based on an uncertain outlook.】

item.title: 萨默斯称，资产负债表流失速度放缓是债务脆弱性的 "警示 "信号
item.description: 前财政部长劳伦斯-萨默斯（Lawrence Summers）说，美联储决定大幅放缓美国国债持有量的缩减速度，这是对市场长期联邦债务需求发出的一个令人担忧的信号。【原文：Former Treasury Secretary Lawrence Summers said the Federal Reserve’s decision to dramatically slow down the shrinkage of its US Treasuries holdings amounts to a worrying signal about market demand for longer-term federal debt.】

item.title: 特朗普关税促使法国游艇制造商放弃盈利预测
item.description: 博纳多公司（Beneteau SA）是一家法国帆船和动力艇制造商，约 20% 的销售额来自美国，但由于特朗普政府贸易政策的不确定性，该公司没有提供年度利润预测。【原文：Beneteau SA, a French maker of sailing yachts and powerboats that generates about 20% of its sales in the US, isn’t providing an annual profit forecast because of uncertainty over Trump administration trade policies.】

item.title: 离职》职场惊悚片为苹果带来亟需的热门话题
item.description:
这部讲述虚构的 Lumon Industries 的节目已成为一种文化现象。这是否会转化为持久的用户增长？【原文：

The show about the fictional Lumon Industries has become a cultural phenomenon. Will that translate into lasting subscriber growth?

】

item.title: 慕尼黑再保险公司旗下 Ergo 将以 26 亿美元收购 Next Insurance
item.description: 慕尼黑再保险公司（Munich Re）同意收购美国初创公司 Next Insurance，交易估值为 26 亿美元。【原文：Munich Re agreed to buy Next Insurance in a deal valuing the US-based startup at $2.6 billion.】

item.title: 即使最受欢迎的交易出现负面影响，里拉汇率仍吸引了对冲基金的关注
item.description: 随着土耳其里拉出现四年来最大幅度的下跌，帕维尔-马迈看到了他一直在等待的机会。【原文：As the Turkish lira took its sharpest nosedive in four years, Pavel Mamai saw the opportunity he’d been waiting for.】

item.title: 苹果公司调整人工智能高管团队，力图扭转 Siri 的颓势
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，苹果公司正在对其高管团队进行罕见的调整，目的是让其人工智能工作在经历了数月的延误和磕磕绊绊之后重回正轨。【原文：Apple Inc. is undergoing a rare shake-up of its executive ranks, aiming to get its artificial intelligence efforts back on track after months of delays and stumbles, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 国际奥委会选举前奥运游泳选手考文垂为最年轻主席
item.description: 七次获得奥运会游泳奖牌的科斯特-考文垂当选为国际奥林匹克委员会主席，成为该组织有史以来最年轻的主席。【原文：Kirsty Coventry, a seven-times Olympic medal-winning swimmer, was elected president of the International Olympic Committee, becoming the organization’s youngest ever head.】

item.title: 欧佩克+石油配额违规者更新补偿削减承诺
item.description: 持续超过石油生产配额的欧佩克+国家提供了进一步削减补偿的最新计划。【原文：OPEC+ nations that have persistently exceeded oil production quotas provided updated plans to make additional cutbacks in compensation.】

item.title: 特朗普重申支持加密货币和稳定币立法
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）重申了其政府自他重返美国总统职位以来所采取的支持加密货币的行动，并重申支持稳定币立法，称这将有助于扩大美元的主导地位。【原文：Donald Trump rehashed the crypto-supportive actions taken by his administration since he returned to the US presidency and reiterated support for stablecoin legislation, saying it will help expand the dollar’s dominance.】

item.title: 佩顿-曼宁加入 "善行高尔夫 "4500 万美元筹款活动
item.description:
该初创公司的 YouTube 频道已吸引了超过 175 万订阅者

。【原文：

The startup’s YouTube channel has attracted more than 1.75 million subscribers

】

item.title: 美国准备将雪佛龙委内瑞拉石油公司的最后期限延长至 4 月 3 日之后
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，在总部位于得克萨斯州的石油巨头雪佛龙公司的游说下，特朗普政府准备将该公司停止委内瑞拉业务的期限至少再延长 30 天。【原文：The Trump administration is poised to extend Chevron Corp.’s deadline to halt its Venezuela operations for at least another 30 days, following lobbying efforts by the Texas-based oil giant, people familiar with the matter said.】
